text: Brillantissime is a French comedy film directed by Michèle Laroque and based on the play My Brilliant Divorce by Geraldine Aron. It was released in France on 17 January 2018. ==Cast== ==Production== The film was produced thanks to donations on touscoprod.com. The shooting of the film began on March 20 and ended in May 2017 in Nice. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2018 films Category:2018 comedy films Category:French films Category:French comedy films Category:French-language films
title: Brillantissime
